product_name: Dynafit Beast 14 Randonee Bindings with 120mm Brakes - 2014/2015
long_description: A great choice for skiers who seek a light freeride binding with top performance from DIN 5 - 14, the Beast Randonee Bindings with 120mm-wide brakes let you charge hard down backcountry lines.
short_description: A great choice for skiers who seek a light freeride binding with top performance from DIN 5 - 14, the Beast Randonee Bindings with 120mm-wide brakes let you charge hard down backcountry lines.
